name: Introduction to Archaeology
description: An introductory course on the history, methods, theories, and concepts of archaeology.

name: Historical Archaeology
description: A course focusing on the history of archaeological practice and the use of archaeological evidence to understand past societies.

name: Historical Archaeological Field Methods
description: This course focuses on the methods and techniques used to collect archaeological data in the field.

name: Archaeological Analysis and Interpretation
description: This course covers the use of archaeological evidence to interpret past societies.

name: Advanced Historical Archaeology
description: This course provides a more in-depth look at the history, methods, theories, and concepts of historical archaeology.
